QuestData.Title: Extra Limbs
QuestData.Description:
We cannot carry out the baroness's plans alone. What she proposes will require a well-coordinated unit.
Three individuals maintained Nurakkir alongside me. When the necropolis fell, two of my soulbinds fell with it.
There remains a single soul paired with mine. My sister, Xennir, survived the wreckage--though grief besets her.
Meet with Xennir. Guide her through her trauma, and return when she is ready to rejoin the fight.
QuestData.RewardText: We have suffered so terribly. I must preserve what I still have.
